name: Tinker
description: Ingenious inventors and mechanical specialists who harness technology and engineering to create devices, gadgets, and contraptions that solve problems and overcome challenges.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical and mental energy that powers invention and device operation
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when operating or repairing devices
mechanics: Energy points are spent to operate devices and power inventions
Some devices require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to invention effectiveness and operation speed
Can be temporarily boosted through inspiration in critical situations
Successful invention operation or repair restores a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Scrap
resource_systems.description: Raw materials and components that can be salvaged and repurposed for inventions
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when salvaging items or collecting materials, decreases when crafting
mechanics: Increases by 10 when salvaging mechanical items or technological components
Increases by 15 when discovering rare materials or components
Decreases when crafting devices or inventions based on complexity
Decreases by 5 per hour when maintaining multiple active devices
Can be spent to create temporary devices or repair damaged inventions
Higher Scrap quality increases invention effectiveness and durability

class_mechanics.description: Natural talent for understanding and manipulating mechanical systems
effects: Can quickly analyze and understand the function of mechanical devices
Able to repair damaged devices with minimal tools
Can identify weaknesses in mechanical structures and systems
Presence allows for intuitive operation of unfamiliar machinery
Can improvise tools and simple devices from available materials

class_mechanics.name: Inventor's Insight
class_mechanics.description: Ability to envision and create innovative solutions to problems
effects: Can design custom devices to address specific challenges
Able to improve existing designs for enhanced performance
Can combine disparate components in unexpected but effective ways
Presence stimulates creative thinking in allies
Can analyze problems to determine optimal technological solutions

class_mechanics.name: Gadgeteer
class_mechanics.description: Skill at creating and using compact, specialized devices
effects: Can create small gadgets with specific functions
Able to carry and maintain multiple gadgets simultaneously
Can quickly deploy gadgets in tactical situations
Presence allows for intuitive coordination of multiple devices
Can modify gadgets on the fly to adapt to changing circumstances

class_mechanics.description: Comprehensive understanding of scientific and engineering principles
effects: Can apply theoretical knowledge to practical problems
Able to reverse-engineer unfamiliar technology
Can identify optimal materials and components for specific applications
Presence enhances the effectiveness of collaborative technical work
Can predict the behavior of complex systems based on first principles

skill_trees.focus: Creation and use of specialized tools and devices
key_abilities: Pocket Arsenal: Create and maintain multiple compact gadgets

skill_trees.focus: Building and operating larger mechanical constructs
key_abilities: Construct Assembly: Build temporary mechanical assistants

key_abilities: Elemental Infusion: Incorporate elemental properties into devices
Alchemical Catalyst: Create substances that enhance device performance
Transmutation Application: Change material properties for specific uses

arch_classes.name: Mechanist
arch_classes.description: Tinkers who have specialized in advanced mechanical systems and automated constructs, creating complex machines that can operate independently.

lore: Tinkers represent the innovative spirit of civilization, constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible through technology and invention. Unlike the mystical powers of mages or the divine blessings of clerics, tinkers rely on ingenuity, technical knowledge, and practical application to overcome challenges. Their training encompasses not just theoretical understanding but also hands-on experience with a wide range of materials, tools, and mechanical principles, making them versatile problem-solvers in any situation requiring technical solutions. Many tinkers begin their careers as apprentices to established inventors or in academic institutions where they can study existing technology before developing their own innovations. Some are self-taught experimenters who developed their abilities through trial and error, often driven by necessity or curiosity. Regardless of their background, all tinkers share a passion for creation and improvement, constantly seeking to refine their designs and develop new solutions. In dangerous situations, tinkers excel at adapting to unexpected challenges through rapid invention and deployment of specialized devices. Their ability to create tools specifically designed for the task at hand makes them invaluable members of any adventuring party, providing unique solutions that would be impossible through conventional means. Though they may lack the raw power of more combat-focused classes, the versatility and tactical advantages provided by tinkers often prove decisive in complex encounters where creativity trumps brute force.
